snippet.title: HalOPE trailer
snippet.description:
HalOPE is a surreal exploration/"puzzle-ish" RPGMaker game about breaking cycles and becoming whole.

play as The Angel, an incomplete being that has been left behind. Explore 4 colorful worlds locked behind mysterious doors, as well as the spaces between them. You'll slowly learn the stories of those you meet, as well as the reason behind your own existence. 

Find out more below:
https://starbage.itch.io/halope
